The two sisters initially have nothing in common, but they gradually begin to understand each other better. Eventually, Elizabeth begins to fall in love with someone named Mr. Darcy, while Jane begins to fall in love with someone named Mr. Bingley. Ultimately, the two sisters decide to elope together, without being able to tell their grandmother about it first.
